subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Ahhh the infamous Fish!
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
Actually, that's not quite right.  All we are is motion within motion.
:-)

Zack

On Mon, 18 Aug 2008, black bear hollow wrote:

> According to physics, we and all in our "reality" are nothing but light. So 
> this would make sense Charm. :)
>
> w.
> On Aug 18, 2008, at 1:15 AM, Pridegrl Neverumind wrote:
>
>> I dont know if this applies to this situation or not, but in my out-of-body 
>> experiences, I can see each person's  ' light.'
>> Most peoples lights are white- but some I have seen are pink, and some 
>> blue, and I have seen green and orange. There may be other colours. I do 
>> not know why the color differences, but it will give me some questions to 
>> ask on my next session.
>> Charm
>
